name: Project Neo
description:
There are maze games and then there is Project Neo. This is unlike any maze challenge you have ever tried. Lock your doors, put the dog out, warn the loved ones to stay away, and tighten your diapers because this game will drive you to the edge of insanity. This game CAN be won but it will drive you crazy first. DISCLAIMER: we are not responsible for fits of rage or kicking of cats. 

Have a good day from the bros at PŌGU and Geometry!

2018 Edition Coming Soon!
